SKOS_CONCEPT.definition: World Health Organization Disability Assessment Schedule 2.0 - 12-Item Proxy - Overall, in the past 30 days, how many days were these difficulties present?
SKOS_CONCEPT.pref_label: WHODAS 2.0 12-item Version Proxy-administered - How Many Days Difficulties Present

SKOS_CONCEPT.alt_label: WD2-Days Unable to Carry Out Activities
SKOS_CONCEPT.definition: World Health Organization Disability Assessment Schedule 2.0 - 12-Item Proxy - In the past 30 days, for how many days were you totally unable to carry out your usual activities or work because of any health condition?
SKOS_CONCEPT.pref_label: WHODAS 2.0 12-item Version Proxy-administered - Days Unable to Carry Out Activities

SKOS_CONCEPT.definition: World Health Organization Disability Assessment Schedule 2.0 - 12-Item Proxy - In the past 30 days, not counting the days that you were totally unable, for how many days did you cut back or reduce your usual activities or work because of any health condition?
SKOS_CONCEPT.pref_label: WHODAS 2.0 12-item Version Proxy-administered - How Many Days Reduce Activities

SKOS_CONCEPT.alt_label: WD2-I Am (Fill in Blank) of This Person
SKOS_CONCEPT.definition: World Health Organization Disability Assessment Schedule 2.0 - 12-Item Proxy - I am the (Fill in the Blank) of this person.
SKOS_CONCEPT.pref_label: WHODAS 2.0 12-item Version Proxy-administered - I Am the (Fill in the Blank) of This Person

SKOS_CONCEPT.definition: World Health Organization Disability Assessment Schedule 2.0 - 12-Item Proxy - In the past 30 days, how much difficulty did your relative have in: Standing for long periods such as 30 minutes?
SKOS_CONCEPT.pref_label: WHODAS 2.0 12-item Version Proxy-administered - Standing for Long Periods

SKOS_CONCEPT.alt_label: WD2-Dealing With People Does Not Know
SKOS_CONCEPT.definition: World Health Organization Disability Assessment Schedule 2.0 - 12-Item Proxy - In the past 30 days, how much difficulty did your relative have in: Dealing with people he or she does not know?
SKOS_CONCEPT.pref_label: WHODAS 2.0 12-item Version Proxy-administered - Dealing With People Does Not Know

SKOS_CONCEPT.definition: World Health Organization Disability Assessment Schedule 2.0 - 12-Item Proxy - In the past 30 days, how much difficulty did your relative have in: Maintaining a friendship?
SKOS_CONCEPT.pref_label: WHODAS 2.0 12-item Version Proxy-administered - Maintaining a Friendship

SKOS_CONCEPT.definition: World Health Organization Disability Assessment Schedule 2.0 - 12-Item Proxy - In the past 30 days, how much difficulty did your relative have in: His or her day-to-day work?
SKOS_CONCEPT.pref_label: WHODAS 2.0 12-item Version Proxy-administered - Your Day-to-Day Work or School

SKOS_CONCEPT.definition: World Health Organization Disability Assessment Schedule 2.0 - 12-Item Proxy - In the past 30 days, how much difficulty did your relative have in: Taking care of his or her household responsibilities?
SKOS_CONCEPT.pref_label: WHODAS 2.0 12-item Version Proxy-administered - Care of Household Responsibilities

SKOS_CONCEPT.definition: World Health Organization Disability Assessment Schedule 2.0 - 12-Item Proxy - In the past 30 days, how much difficulty did your relative have in: Learning a new task, for example, learning how to get to a new place?
SKOS_CONCEPT.pref_label: WHODAS 2.0 12-item Version Proxy-administered - Learning a New Task

SKOS_CONCEPT.definition: World Health Organization Disability Assessment Schedule 2.0 - 12-Item Proxy - In the past 30 days, how much difficulty did your relative have in: How much of a problem did your relative have joining in community activities (for example, festivities, religious or other activities) in the same way as anyone else can?
SKOS_CONCEPT.pref_label: WHODAS 2.0 12-item Version Proxy-administered - Problem Joining Community Activities

SKOS_CONCEPT.definition: World Health Organization Disability Assessment Schedule 2.0 - 12-Item Proxy - In the past 30 days, how much difficulty did your relative have in: How much has your relative been emotionally affected by his or her health condition?
SKOS_CONCEPT.pref_label: WHODAS 2.0 12-item Version Proxy-administered - Emotionally Affected by Health

SKOS_CONCEPT.definition: World Health Organization Disability Assessment Schedule 2.0 - 12-Item Proxy - In the past 30 days, how much difficulty did your relative have in: Concentrating on doing something for ten minutes?
SKOS_CONCEPT.pref_label: WHODAS 2.0 12-item Version Proxy-administered - Concentrating for Ten Minutes

SKOS_CONCEPT.definition: World Health Organization Disability Assessment Schedule 2.0 - 12-Item Proxy - In the past 30 days, how much difficulty did your relative have in: Walking a long distance such as a kilometre [or equivalent]?
SKOS_CONCEPT.pref_label: WHODAS 2.0 12-item Version Proxy-administered - Walking a Long Distance

SKOS_CONCEPT.definition: World Health Organization Disability Assessment Schedule 2.0 - 12-Item Proxy - In the past 30 days, how much difficulty did your relative have in: Washing his or her whole body?
SKOS_CONCEPT.pref_label: WHODAS 2.0 12-item Version Proxy-administered - Washing His or Her Whole Body

SKOS_CONCEPT.definition: World Health Organization Disability Assessment Schedule 2.0 - 12-Item Proxy - In the past 30 days, how much difficulty did your relative have in: Getting dressed?
